MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY6 postcode area of Glenrothes, affecting properties in Prinlaws Road and surrounding streets.  It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2.15pm to make repairs to an underground cable damaged by a 3rd party outside 43 Primlaws Road. Our engineers are continuing to make repairs onsite and will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible.  Once we receive information from them we will update this message to let you know when the power will be restored. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.15pm on 26th October 2020.
